mapper.select: select rp.probe_id AS probe_id, rp.port AS port, rp.task_id AS task_id, rp.service_type AS service_type, rp.target_id AS target_id, rp.target_ip AS target_ip, rp.record_time AS record_time, rp.record_date AS record_date, probe.city_id AS city_id, probe.county_id AS county_id, AVG(rp.dns_delay) AS dns_delay, AVG(rp.ws_conn_delay) AS ws_conn_delay, AVG(rp.web_page_delay) AS web_page_delay, AVG(rp.ss_conn_delay) AS ss_conn_delay, AVG(rp.address_delay) AS address_delay, AVG(rp.ms_conn_delay) AS ms_conn_delay, AVG(rp.head_frame_delay) AS head_frame_delay, AVG(rp.init_buffer_delay) AS init_buffer_delay, AVG(rp.load_delay) AS load_delay, AVG(rp.total_buffer_delay) AS total_buffer_delay, AVG(rp.download_rate) AS download_rate, AVG(rp.buffer_time) AS buffer_time, rp.remark AS remark, t.fail AS fail, t.total AS total FROM record_web_video rp LEFT JOIN probe ON rp.probe_id =probe.id INNER JOIN (SELECT probe_id AS probe_id, port AS port, task_id AS task_id, service_type AS service_type, target_id AS target_id, sum(state) AS fail, count(record_web_video.id) AS total FROM record_web_video INNER JOIN probe ON probe_id = probe.id WHERE record_date = #{record_date} AND record_time BETWEEN #{start_time} AND #{terminal_time} GROUP BY port, service_type, target_id, task_id, probe_id) t WHERE rp.record_date = #{record_date} AND rp.record_time BETWEEN #{start_time} AND #{terminal_time} AND rp.state = 0 GROUP BY rp.port,rp.service_type,rp.target_id,rp.task_id,rp.probe_id;

select rp.probe_id AS probe_id, rp.port AS port, rp.task_id AS task_id, rp.service_type AS service_type, rp.target_id AS target_id, rp.target_ip AS target_ip, rp.record_time AS record_time, rp.record_date AS record_date, probe.city_id AS city_id, probe.county_id AS county_id, AVG(rp.dns_delay) AS dns_delay, AVG(rp.ws_conn_delay) AS ws_conn_delay, AVG(rp.web_page_delay) AS web_page_delay, AVG(rp.ss_conn_delay) AS ss_conn_delay, AVG(rp.address_delay) AS address_delay, AVG(rp.ms_conn_delay) AS ms_conn_delay, AVG(rp.head_frame_delay) AS head_frame_delay, AVG(rp.init_buffer_delay) AS init_buffer_delay, AVG(rp.load_delay) AS load_delay, AVG(rp.total_buffer_delay) AS total_buffer_delay, AVG(rp.download_rate) AS download_rate, AVG(rp.buffer_time) AS buffer_time, rp.remark AS remark, t.fail AS fail, t.total AS total FROM record_web_video rp LEFT JOIN probe ON rp.probe_id =probe.id INNER JOIN (SELECT probe_id AS probe_id, port AS port, task_id AS task_id, service_type AS service_type, target_id AS target_id, sum(state) AS fail, count(record_web_video.id) AS total FROM record_web_video INNER JOIN probe ON probe_id = probe.id WHERE record_date = #{record_date} AND record_time BETWEEN #{start_time} AND #{terminal_time} GROUP BY port, service_type, target_id, task_id, probe_id) t WHERE rp.record_date = #{record_date} AND rp.state = 0 GROUP BY rp.port,rp.service_type,rp.target_id,rp.task_id,rp.probe_id;
mapper.delete:
delete from record_web_video where id in
#{id}
